item.description: We especially need NASHUA RESIDENTS at this one. We need to have Ron Paul supporters on the TV panel http://www.nhgop.org/... The Nashua Republican City Committee monthly meeting for January, 2012 will be held on Thursday, January 5, 2012 at the Crowne Plaza, Nashua in the Trafalgar Room at 7:00pm. Doors open at 6:30pm. Meeting is free. All major presidential candidates have been invited and are expected to attend. This is the last NRCC meeting before the NH Primary on January 10, 2012. This will be a standing-room only meeting so be sure to come early to secure your seat. We are also expecting extensive media coverage for this meeting. Bring a neighbor and friend and ask your question of the candidate of your choice or, if you're still undecided, check out all the candidates! Di Lothrop, Communications Director & Event Chair dilothrop@yahoo.com 603-864-9287
item.name: Participate in televised panel at NRCC
